Reviews.Title: New to this... LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: digital.maverick
Reviews.Content: Boy did I pick the right camera.I am just looking to record my front yard in case anyone tries anything cute.What I did is combined the camera with a MyGica Capit USB capture card to plug it into my laptop.The software I am using is the free for one camera Vitamin D video... wonderful softwareThe results are perfect.  This camera is sturdy, durable, crystal clear, sees in the darkness, and easily adjustable.  Basically I got a complete surveillance system for little more than the price of this camera and the 17 bucks for the capture card.Only downside is no PTZ.  But I wasn't even looking for that and don't care about it.( I forgot to mention one thing... I would advise you buy the 100 ft VideoSecu power and video cable on this site... it comes with the adapter you need as well. The camera itself only has a short cord and needs an adapter for an RCA jack )

Reviews.Title: Works better in daylight than at night
Reviews.Author: Auton
Reviews.Content: We bought this to expand our security system.  It is a good value for the money.  The resolution is pretty good, especially for distance less than 30 feet.  Beyond that it is a little vague.  The IR illumination is ok, but close objects end up washed out and more distant objects are not visible at all.  Installation was pretty easy, but there were no real instructions at all and no template for the mounting holes.  The mounting holes are ALMOST just the right size to mount to a standard ceiling box.  I would not consider this mounting to be vandal proof, as it can be moved, disconnected and re-aimed form outside with no tools.  The camera seems pretty resistant to fogging and operates well at all the temperatures we have encountered so far.

Reviews.Title: Good Cam
Reviews.Author: Gus
Reviews.Content: Got this cam to deter our local gas thieves, so was only concerned about its night vision. Am still experimenting with it, but I can I.D. people from 30 to 35 feet in total darkness.  Easy to install and a great deal for the price. Daytime vision is good in shady areas, but bright sunlight seems to wash out the picture a bit. I.R. LEDs are visible at night, but hopefully this will help as a deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Batavia Machinery, Inc "Batavia Machinery"
Reviews.Content: So I bought one camera first to replace the one that came with the system and was blown away I was so happy I bought four more from AMARKET IMPORTS Inc. Delivery was super quick only 3 days in transit that is fast to me when I asked for super free shipping!!Okay now down to business about the cams.Pros:Super easy to install they come with a plug so you can cut off the end of the plug and splice it to the cameraCameras are sleek not like 7-11 style they look good on the house. Picture is really good way better than the Costco cameras. Night time really lights up well and day time is great too but have notices when it gets really sunny out you get a washout but goes away.  That is about it. I would buy more of these if I had more channels on my DVR.If you want to see what the camera's at night look like click here:[...]

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: slvbeard
Reviews.Content: This is a very well built little dome camera.  The case is all metal construction and tamper resistant.  Good resolution and color, low light works great, and the picture is clear.  I got this to replace a Vonnic dome camera.  The Vonnic had problems with too much color saturation in the picture, this one looks better, much sharper image quality and even color.  I would absolutely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera Great Price
Reviews.Author: J. Michael
Reviews.Content: As other reviews have already stated this camera is a great deal for what it's selling for.  I originally just purchased one camera to test out with the new dvr I just bought.  I can say that I definately agree with the other reviews.  Good color, nice clarity, good at night and during the day.  Since ordering the first camera I have ordered another 3 more along with the 50' bnc/power cable.  For the price I'd highly recommend this to anyone who's wanting to try out the world of cctv cameras.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Supra7tt
Reviews.Content: I bought a DVR system from somewhere else that came with bullet style daytime color/black&white; night vision cameras. But the camera angel was not wide enough for the area I wanted coverage on. This camera was my answer. It covered the entire front yard from a high point on a single story home. The video footage is on par or slightly less that that of a standard video camera. Plus the viewing quality was much better that the cameras the DVR system came with (again I did not buy the DVR System at Amazon). Which to me is perfect for the average single story budget strapped homeowner. I like how the housing covers the wiring to prevent someone tampering with it. It is much less noticeable than the bullet style. You can even paint the housing to match your house color. Overall I was happy with the camera's performance & price that I bought another one.You might need extra cables or adapters depending on your setup & use. I ended up needing a male BNC to Female Video RCA adapter to work with my set up. Have fun!I haven't had a chance to view it's night vision ability but I'm sure it's will be fine. I will update once I find out.

Reviews.Title: High Quality Inexpensive Camera
Reviews.Author: Dominic A. Pizza
Reviews.Content: This camera has very good daylight capabilities and some of the best IR night performance of any camera in it's price range.  Installation was trouble free, and aiming the camera requires no tools.  I'm very satisfied with this unit and would not hesitate to buy another if the need for an additional dome camera arrises.

Reviews.Title: I've seen a lot of bad cheap cameras, this is a GREAT cheap camera.
Reviews.Author: J. Wallace
Reviews.Content: I've worked in the security industry a long time.  I've seen a lot of bad cheap cameras.  This, is a GREAT cheap camera.The IR does not splash back into the lens, this is because the glass over the lens is independent from the glass over the IR LEDs.  It's not the cheesy foam ring around the lens setup, this is truly 2 sets of glass (The right way to do it, and rare on a cheap camera)The LED illumination is quite evenly spread out, and reaches effectively about 25' or so in my experience so far, without a hard hot spot in the middle.The IRs and the camera imager processing are adjusted to be really well in tune with each other.The lens FOV is about 85+ degrees (almost 90 degrees) from the glass.It is a turret dome design, with all metal housing, with the outer ring that screws down over the base to hold the ball in place.  It is a 4 piece design.  (base, ring, hood, ball)  It goes together very easily.Low noise, good color, good light sensitivity.Bonus, it includes the power adapter and surveillance warning sticker that pro installers don't care about, but consumer end-users will appreciate.Cons:  Screwing down the hood secures the camera fine, but not from a vandal resistant stand point.  Some can still easily grab and turn the camera to a different angle (it's not super tight).  So if it's in a public place, mount it out of reach.The cable is not sealed where it enters the ball housing.  (during assembly the cable has to move through the back)  I solved this by adding some silicon around where the cable enters the ball to keep ambient moisture out.  easy.  The rest of it seems pretty water resistant.There is some minor vignetting but it's not too dramatic.  (slightly darker areas in the corners of the image)Bang for the buck, you can't beat this.  I'm ordering additional units now.  I've got two watching my driveway, and they work great.

Reviews.Title: This item is only 6 inches wide
Reviews.Author: DC Maxx "Wood"
Reviews.Content: Have it on rear soffit facing down outside rear staircase. It is aerodynamic; unobtrusive and for the past 2 months it has illuminated the view of my back staircase; however had to add an outdoor illuminator (+$35) to get a good consistent picture from it. Be forewarned.

Reviews.Title: Punches well above its weight class!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Kyne "Tech-Ninja"
Reviews.Content: This is the 4th camera like this I have bought. Do not let the low price fool you, this is a great camera.I live just to the left of nowhere, and need to take full responsibility for the safety and security of my family. So when I built my house I planned out and installed a multi-camera DVR. In total I have 13 cameras surrounding my house and 3 inside. Some of the cameras are the cheap ones that came with the DVR. When one wore out I replaced it with this model. WOW, what a difference it makes. The colors are accurate, the field of vision is great (about 110°-120°) and the night vision is remarkable. This one was installed at my front door and the infrared illumination is so bright that I can pick it up on other cameras out front. I liked it so much that I bought 2 more and installed them in my kids rooms instead of the crappy baby monitors. I just bought my 4th and installed it in the living room to use as a nanny cam. I can not recommend these enough.By the way, I also have a $100 camera installed over my driveway that has more 600 TV lines, (I wanted to be able to read license plates) and the image quality of the Video Secure camera is nearly identical, for about 1/3 the cost.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera. A bargain for the money.
Reviews.Author: Shopper12
Reviews.Content: I recently installed a surveillance system with all of the upgraded CCTV cameras it came with, but on one channel, I installed this camera. During the day, all things are equal. However, during the evening the IR on this camera, in comparison to the IR on the Zmodo's, makes this camera a far superior product from dusk to dawn. So much so, I just ordered a second one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and picture quality
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: Videosecu Day Night Vision CCTV CCD Home Security Camera Outdoor Vandal Proof 420TVL 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens with Free Power Supply 1WXCame a day early. Got this bundled with the VideoSecu Video & Power 50 Feet BNC RCA Cable for Security Cameras 1JDThe cable fits with the camera's power adapter and BNC input cable perfectly. I highly recommend buying that too if you get this camera. Fairly easy set up. Adjusting the angle took a little time. Great picture/colors from camera day or night. Red lights at night aren't too bright. Very satisfied! Very good for this price. I was surprised. The only thing --  Did not come with security decal, but I don't mind. I was expecting it to come with mounting screws, but it doesn't. Box says 12bit high image quality, DSP digital processing, Low power consumption, High sensitivity and DNR function, Installed lens. Hooked it up to a VCR for recording. I highly recommend this item and seller though and would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Brewski
Reviews.Content: I have many different types of cameras around my house that I use in my system, and I have to say that this one I like the best.  The image from the camera is crisp and clear, in both night and day settings.  I prefer wide-angle lenses for use in home surveillance so I was happy that it shipped with one.  IR lights are visible to the naked eye, but are definitely powerful enough.  They lit up a 25ft long room with no problems at all.  I'm glad this unit ships with a CCD instead of a CMOS chip, as the quality of the image is so much better!The housing is decent, though it feels like the paint can chip off easily.  It ships with the tool you need to adjust the bracket.  The bracket itself is a bit cumbersome to use, since you end up fighting yourself when you screw it all together.  I had to have the camera plugged in to figure out which way was up (the photo-resistor is at bottom of the screen) since there are no markings.Unlike many other cameras, this one did not include a cable to hook into your DVR.  I don't find that to be a problem, but it will add to the cost of the camera.Because it uses 12V, you should be able to use a computer to power the camera.  At 500ma, it shouldn't be much of an issue for your computer's power supply, and you'll eliminate a ground loop error in the process.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I'd hoped for
Reviews.Author: Marypearl "Marypearl"
Reviews.Content: Camera shows black and white in the daytime. Nothing at night that's more that 5 feet away. There are better cameras at the same price. Edited 2/13/2013  I found that the camera will function at night but only in a small room with white walls and floor. Works in my 6'X 8' mud room.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah P
Reviews.Content: The picture is clear, the night vision was amazingly better then I anticipated. Even with the 150 foot cord the video was crisp. We have it hooked to a PC in our home with a  video converter I purchased for 40$. Great camera for the price. We are looking to get 2 more down the road.

Reviews.Title: No nightvision
Reviews.Author: Sunny O.
Reviews.Content: My camera came defective and has no night vision.  I suggest you better check that it works before you mount it.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: twin momma
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item to view the inground pool in our backyard. It works wonderful. I had to purchase a bnc to hdmi converter box for it to work on my TV. Now I can stay inside with the 7 month old and watch over my 7 year old boys while they swim. I purchased the 100 ft cable to go with it. There is no cable included so you will need this (or what ever length you require). The night vision works well also. It is very dark in the back yard and through the camera it looks like dusk. I would recommend this over and over.

Reviews.Title: In service for a year and still going strong
Reviews.Author: RWSJR
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera installed for a year in an outdoor location, exposed to extremes in cold, heat, snow and rain and it is still going strong.  First impression out of the box was that the unit is very sturdy and well built.  I'm also very pleased with the video quality, which is clear and provides a wide angle of field.  Going to order another one for the back of my property soon.  Definitely lives up to its billing in every way.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: ALJ
Reviews.Content: This replaced that other type, which someone (we did see on video who, but cant find him again) hit it with a traffic cone, and hours later cut the wire and took it.  This one at least is not tiltable by a stick or other item, it appears vandel proof, unless they get a ladder and unscrew it.  But, you can always gorilla glue the twisting locking part in place!  But that makes it pretty permanent, not even you will be able to get it apart to remove it.  Quality is great, though high mounting as with all, mostly gives a view of the top of the head if its pointed pretty straight downward, like at a door opening.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Infrared Home
Reviews.Author: fjhh
Reviews.Content: Video is very good, nite vision is good, use in an entrance way for house.  This is a wide angle view.  Easy to adjust.

Reviews.Title: worked good then crapped out
Reviews.Author: Kendall Harris
Reviews.Content: I bought two back in August 2011, one mounted outside by the front door and one mounted inside to capture video when I am gone.  The one outside is still working fine but April 2012 the one inside just crapped out.  Image turned to BW and is reversed (no idea what why)  It was mounted on the ceiling and was never touched, bumped etc... I tried to exchange but its past the return date.  I'm not sure if I'd be willing to recommend purchasing this or not, I guess so far its been 50/50.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to supplement a system I had just bought.  The cameras that came with the system, a Night Owl Poseidon-85, are not wide angle.  This camera is fairly wide, but if you are using it with the camera pointed fairly straight out, there is some reflection from the vandal-proof housing from the IR illumination.  The inside of the housing should be flat black, but it's gloss white.  I'm going to trim the housing, and paint it flat black, on the inside, and see what happens.  This camera is a lot better than the ones that came with either of my surveillance systems, and it even displays color after dark. The housing is very sturdy, and I would recommend this camera for general purpose applications.

Reviews.Title: Very clear and great picture for only 480 quality
Reviews.Author: John P. Barajas
Reviews.Content: I was expecting crappy image and it actually outperformed the Q-see 740 quality dome that i had also purchased for double or tripple the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Requires cord
Reviews.Author: DPG "DPG"
Reviews.Content: This requires separate ordering of cords. Once I got them, it hooked up fine to a small portable TV and the picture is clear.

Reviews.Title: 3.6 lens camera
Reviews.Author: donald treull
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price . I am using 6 of these and no problems at all. Night time viewing is about 60 feet .Wide angle .

Reviews.Title: Didn't use as of yet
Reviews.Author: Marilyn DeGannes "Marilyn DeGannes"
Reviews.Content: Purchased the product and didn't install as of yet,  Later I discovered that I need an additional cord to attach to VCR.  Gave 4 stars because the product should have mentioned that cord is sold separately.  Once I install product, I will repost and give more feedback regarding product.

Reviews.Title: excellent project specific unit
Reviews.Author: joel "JAZZY JOEL PRODUCTIONS "Quality eve...
Reviews.Content: Fast economical shipping .... Great quality built product..JJP installs High end custom fabricated CCTV systems it is critical that was supply only the best, we will order again!

Reviews.Title: walhter..
Reviews.Author: walhter
Reviews.Content: !!!! this camera works fine the image is clear. I like easy to install, really good buy....I'm very happy thanks

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: JG
Reviews.Content: Good value camera for the money, fast shipping via prime, comes with ac adapter if your not connecting it to a power supply, all metal design, definitely not vandal proof, anyone can just unscrew the entire camera (if they can reach)

Reviews.Title: Cold temps/Bright lights forget about it
Reviews.Author: ultravorx
Reviews.Content: I have 10 of these cameras around my house.  Last spring I had to replace 4 of them due to losing signal.Fast forward to 2014, I have 4 more cameras, 2 original, 2 new that have been losing signal.It appears they have 2 factors that kill the cameras1)Cold temps.2)Bright lights/reflectionsWhen the cameras receive excess sunlight (cameras are not pointed at the sun), from ground refection or just a bright day, they will cut out.  Once this happens 1/2 dozen times, the camera will continue to cut out when bright lights are present.The plus side is the camera that do cut out work great in the basement with night vision excelling and no cutting out, but considering these are outdoor cameras, I am disappointed.

Reviews.Title: I ordered 2 of these cameras to complete my security ...
Reviews.Author: vinny
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these cameras to complete my security system. I usually set them up as a trial on the work bench for a day or two to be sure they work in daylight or night vision. After doing the setups I found 1 out of 2 cameras had no night vision mode. So I returned it. The company was very prompt a responding, handling the return & crediting me. It is just that I see a lot of the cameras & get halos around some of the views, or no night vision or no color in daylight. I found I have to trial then first to be sure they work & then install them.

Reviews.Title: video surveillance cam
Reviews.Author: Norma Davis
Reviews.Content: good quality in all weather so far. picture excellant. very stable when mounted. Just ordered two more to replace existing ca,eras

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: This camera does what I need it for outdoor night and day vision.up to 60 ft. Vision night 100 ft. Clear day.easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Very good image and night vision
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: I bought these a while ago, and have not yet installed them, but I did hook them up to my system to check the image quality, which is just as good as this brand's bullet style camera in the same price range. The mounting style of this is quite different than the bullet camera's, but should present no problems at all by looking at the hardware. These seem to be intended for mounting under a soffit or on a ceiling primarily, where a bullet style is more flexible in where it can be mounted, in my opinion. Tamper proof? That's almost funny. No camera is whip cream proof, lol

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: chickenmonkey
Reviews.Content: I was impressed by the quality of the picture of this unit.  It is quite a bit better than the other bullet style cameras I have.  The night vision is fairly impressive as well.  I do have this pointed at approximately a 35* angle in a alcove of sorts at my home.  Bounces off brick and shines quite well.  I would have no problem identifying someone on this with them being 25' away.  Solid construction.  Only way I would ding this is that the lens is fixed, not verifocal, but I knew that going in now didn't I?

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Durham "Survival Advisor"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these in black (white ones painted black for a few bucks more) and really like them.  I use them for night vision on my little RV.  I have one to the front and one to the rear.  One thing to remember is that the IR LED's put out a LOT of IR light.  Anything nearby the lens can reflect IR light right back into the camera, and cause a blur or "foggy" image.  Great camera for a little money.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Wide-angle camera is really affordable.
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Break-in burgalry incidents around my neighborhood has been up like crazy. This wide-angle Security Camera has offered the best value to me. I have been using this camera for 5-6 months. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Robert Harris "Bob"
Reviews.Content: I was really surprised at the quality of this product and it's ability to deliver a reasonably clear picture day and night- Recommend

Reviews.Title: Wide angle, resolution as expected, poor performance in shadow areas
Reviews.Author: RobertRo
Reviews.Content: I have a Swann defend and deter system that came with 480 VTL 5 mm lens cameras. I thought this would be a nice upgrade for my porch  because of the wide angle. While the wide angle is great the overall performance is very poor in contrasting levels of light, I'll upload a image as well. Basically when the street is in full sun and the house is casting a shadow from roughly 7:30 AM to 11AM any area in sunlight is just a white washed out blob. The Swann camera did not have this issue.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: Andre Tran
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cameras last year and installed them myself.  As of this date, they are stil in good working condition.  The image is better and I love the wider angle for my garage driveway and front porch.  For the price, it was an excellent buy for me.

Reviews.Title: For the money, it works!
Reviews.Author: J. Obra "Avid Review Reader & Writer"
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Infrared Home Security Camera via amazon.com for our home video surveillance system.Video Quality - 6/10:- The video quality from these cameras are almost comparable to todays average webcams.- You can see things moving in the picture, but the details of the pictures are pretty blurry unless you're within a few feet of the camera.- It's really hard to see faces and plate numbers of cars unless they're up close to it.- Colors comes out great from this camera, but nothing too fancy.- Wide angle lens practically covers our entire backyard.Infrared Quality - 6/10:- It just works! Things can still be clearly seen in pitch black darkness from about 50 feet away and also depending on ambient light.- Switches to infrared automatically when it senses that its getting too dark.Build Quality - 9/10:- Entire camera and housing is rock solid metal.- Housing may be hard to adjust/turn, but a little bit of WD-40 (or any other lube) does the trick.Overal Recommendation - 4/5 Stars:- If you're looking for cheap BNC camera dome solutions (video quality is sub-par, but build quality is excellent).- If yon't require the ability of reading plate numbers or clear pictures of peoples faces.- So far these cameras have been running for two weeks straight without stop and still holding up to everything including the weather.- Don't place the camera where there would be a lot of reflections as it would cause the infrared lights to bounce off of it.- Unboxing is simple. Comes with a cute little sticker for security surveillance. Installation is straightforward.- Does not come with BNC cable (but has BNC connections on the camera). Also comes with power supply (not required if running with BNC cable (power and video cable)).Installed without a problem with our LOREX ECO2 8CH DVR.

Reviews.Title: Paint it or get the Black version
Reviews.Author: JustTheFacts
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful once you paint it. The white gloss paint causes a terrible reflection back into the lens of the camera. You won't have any problems during daylight when the sun is out, but at night, it blinds the camera and you won't be able to see anything. Once I painted it with mat black spray paint, I can see at night clearly. It's like the sun is just setting even at 11pm. I can see easily 60 feet or more at night. It's great.The camera is a wide angle lens and will give you about 75 degrees coverage. Much better than the standard lens with about 40 degrees. I used this as my main camera view in a 8 camera setup. The other 7 are standard camera's that came in a Night Owl Kit. This camera has standard connections and should fit many other vendors power connections. BNC connections are standard across all vendors so no issue there.The transformer is included, but I hooked the power line up to my existing kit's power line. It just needs 1 power and 1 BNC connection. No microphone. I would recommend a separate microphone only setup independent of the camera.This camera is not vandal proof. All you need to do is twist the upper ring and the entire piece comes off. No camera is vandal proof, unless you mount it somewhere very high where no one can reach it. In that case, every camera is vandal proof because it's unreachable.

Reviews.Title: VERY good for the bucks
Reviews.Author: BEWARE OF BUYING FROM:GLORIA HOYOS ON AMAZON....
Reviews.Content: This is a VERY GOOD camera for the money.If anyone has ever bought the cd33w-2 from super circuitsthis looks to be the very same cam at $30 less then you canget it from super circuits. super circuits sells good stuffbut between both of these cams for $30 less y not save the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Livin' Life
Reviews.Content: I'm very impressed. For $50 bucks you can't ask for much more. Very nice picture in day light. Illuminates the full view like day time, at night. As far as vanal proof, it's not. Anyone can unscrew the base ring and remove it. Oh and I mounted mine on the underside of the overhang at my front door. It was difficult to adjust the camera high enough to get the ceiling in the view. I think the wire is in the way and prevents adjusting the camera to a completley horizontial position. I would no doubt buy another if needed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent night vision, clear picture
Reviews.Author: ramman "JJramman"
Reviews.Content: These cameras have a great picture and excellent night vision. I have a Zmodo that came with 4 crappy little cameras with poor night vision and poor image quality.These are much, much better!I will say the "vandalproof-ness" is kind of a joke. The design means that unless you can run the cable through the wall you mount it to, then the wire has to run right out the side, exposed. Also, you have to screw the whole together by hand, no set screw anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Works as designed.
Reviews.Author: Reviewer76
Reviews.Content: The usefulness of this camera depends on your needs.  This camera has a wide viewing area, displays colors nicely, and makes the transition to night vision as expected.  The center of the picture when the IR is on is very bright and makes it difficult to see anything that passes directly in front of it.  The overall clarity is good, but at distances over 10 to 15 feet, you cannot make out a person's face.  I'm unable to  identify my own face unless I'm close enough to the camera.  This camera works better for "was someone on my property" and not "who was that person on my property".  However, the camera is clear enough for large objects such as cars at distances of around 30 feet.  I use this particular camera over my front door aimed down at the steps, and for this purpose it works good.  For monitoring a driveway, front/back yard etc., choose a different camera if you need to identify people.  For those of you concerned with such details, neither the camera nor the power supply are UL listed.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality camera at a good price
Reviews.Author: Tech-Guru
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace another (lower end) Videosecure camera. This camera has good resolution and color quality. The camera CAN be adjusted to view video in any direction (e.g. wall or ceiling mount). The instructions were poor, but it is essentially plug-and-play so it was no big deal. Adjusting the direction is easy (unscrew the outter casing to loosen the grip, adjust the camera, and retighten). Image quality using IR in the dark was reasonable. I thought the price was slightly high, thus the 4 stars instead of 5, but all-in-all a reasonable device that does what it's supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Infrared Home Security Camera Color CCD Outdoor Vandal Proof 420TVL 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens w
Reviews.Author: Ark
Reviews.Content: Installation was quick and easy. Picture quality for day/night was OK. But it lasted 5 months then night vision died

Reviews.Title: Junk, save your money
Reviews.Author: Randol L. Smith "Rapsbounty"
Reviews.Content: Installed, lasted 3 months then died, just long enough for the warranty to expire, Bought other cameras, they are still working fine,

Reviews.Title: A great camera
Reviews.Author: Beaudoin
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for what I need. It was easy to install and direct in the right direction. The wide angle gives a good view. For me the focus is good enough in low light but could be better.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: APS
Reviews.Content: It is very nice and the image is very clear, also at night.  The installation is very easy to do.  The delivery and package were perfect.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas R. Mccreedy Jr.
Reviews.Content: very good product. produces a nice clear picture.. I will be purchasing several more. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for affordable surveillance.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the cost
Reviews.Author: Lincoln N. Wellington "Network Doctor"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for a OEM Lorex camera and it was way  superior to my original camera. Excellent daytime  and great nighttime  video. I would definite recommended it.

Reviews.Title: Night Vision is Out of This World !!!
Reviews.Author: Darryl Fry
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and 3 days latter.... its at my house, it came in a brown box with tight packaging and the camera was in a professional looking box from manufacturer.  It came with sticker and power supply and install instructions . IT MAD ME FEEL GOOD BUYING THIS CAMERA BY JUST UN-BOXING IT !!!...... In-stalling the camera was so easy and it works great, The Night Vision is Out of This World !!! I get 40 - 45 feet easy IN COLOR AT NIGHT !!! Only one draw back and that is NO SOUND with this camera at all :(...... Other than that..... I DO RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA ALOTT !!!

Reviews.Title: Very good I unplug the old ones and plug the new ones!
Reviews.Author: alexismtz
Reviews.Content: Very good, I used to have installed a night view camera set with 8, but the angle and clarity were not so good, in the interior ones (5) I just installed, the new ones, uninstalled the old ones, just unplug and plug, everything worked perfectly, now the angle and clarity are a lot better! I've ordered 3 more to complete the 8, plus other 6 for My office with the same issue.

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: Robert Faircloth
Reviews.Content: I have no problems whatsoever with this camera.  It works very well with my low cost security/dvr system.  MaybeI should have given it 5 stars, but it has only been installed for a month so I will wait and see how it performs over time.  Meanwhile, I should say it also works well in low light, and even almost total darkness.  I have it installed on my yacht so I need full time security.Yes..I would recommend this to other buyers.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Ba Tran
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install. Deliver clear picture. This is my first security camera but had no issue.  My system has been working since then.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: dalepres "dalepres"
Reviews.Content: The video quality of this camera is fantastic for the money.  I'm glad I bought it.  Make sure you have a recorder that is good for full D1 recording or you will lose some of the available quality.  We have this installed in the sloped ceiling of our living room and it works great there, day or night.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Camera
Reviews.Author: My Amazon Reviews
Reviews.Content: Works great as opposed to the original bullet cameras I had. Night vision is good, field of view is better than original bullet camera.Have purchased several of these over time as replacements. All have performed great for the money.

Reviews.Title: An excellent choice in this price range
Reviews.Author: James Pierce
Reviews.Content: Installed camera in main room of house. After months of use still working great. Excellent viewing angle and ir night vision. Excellent choice for cctv dome camera in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the money spent.
Reviews.Author: Travis Pryor
Reviews.Content: Great video surveillance camera for the money. Used this one to replace one in my workplace that had failed. Very pleased with the wide angle lense.

Reviews.Title: Great camera !
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: Use this for concealment ! Auto focus and adjustments , infrared for night video, everything auto, just plug and play, decent video , does the job

Reviews.Title: Buy a bunch now, you won't see this price for very long.
Reviews.Author: SheriffJoe
Reviews.Content: They are great cameras for the price Amazon is charging at $32.99And including a Power Supply free? All I can say is wow.5 star rating all around, they are that good.The construction of the unit itself is very good being cast aluminum, the machining of the casting is tight and precise (such as the threading, sizing, fit and finish), and weather sealed.The quality of the graphics is very good, be it viewing on a CRT system directly or viewing on a computer through software. Now a lot has to do with the software itself. Don't blame the camera if you use garbage software.And for $32.99 you will never beat these 480 resolution cameras, even compared to 700 resolution POE (Power Over Ethernet) CCTV consumer grade security cameras selling for $200.00.I got the first one and after viewing it on my system, I ordered 11 more right away, before the price goes up.I use these cameras with a Sharx Security SCXSC300 16 Channel PCI-express Digital Video Recorder DVR and Remote Internet Access Card with Windows 7 Driver and Software.  24/7 Recording, 16 BNC video inputs for connection of 16 wired cameras + 4 audio inputs120 frames per second (total) at 720 x 480 resolution for smooth, detailed videoIncludes Windows 7 32 bit and 64 bit driver and SecurityCenter software for viewing, recording, or internet access. The SecurityPlayer software allows remote internet access.MPEG4 and H.264 video compression, with or without motion detectionAlso fully compatible with LuxRiot and BlueIris softwareThese cameras are compatible with my system and produce perfect quality video.As I said, I bought 11 more today for a total of 16 cameras, to fill my system.Buy a bunch now, you won't see this price for very long.

Reviews.Title: Cost effective monitor for the driveway
Reviews.Author: Daniel Egan
Reviews.Content: Our house is situated in a way where we cannot see the driveway.  I set this up so that I can monitor the driveway and the man door.  Often times the UPS guy leaves packages where we can't see them.  This really helps.  The field of vision is adequate and it seems to work fine at night.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Peter Z. Simpson
Reviews.Content: I installed this on an interior wall, to watch the slider in my sunroom.  Installation went well, my only issue was threading the retaining ring on with the camera aimed off center was difficult, due to the large diameter, fine threads and snug fit.  Eventually, it went on, and the camera works very nicely.  The entire mounting system is metal and feels very solid. The camera ball seems well made and the connectors are of good quality.  I used a 100 ft power/video cable, which I fished through the wall and haven't noticed any image or power issues.The lens covers the entire room (18 ft x18 ft), with the camera mounted about 8 ft up in a corner of the room.  The camera works well day and night. The infrared LEDs evenly light the entire room at night (this was a pleasant surprise), and full sunlight during the day doesn't overpower the sensor.  All in all, this product seems to do the job well for a very reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: andrew "PFC Brian"
Reviews.Content: Best camera i have .....very clear and nightvision is best i have found.  Easy mounting and great tamper safe security

Reviews.Title: Camera works great
Reviews.Author: Wanda Budgick
Reviews.Content: We feel more secure now.  if this is the most I need to post I will gladly post it for the required comments

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Leonel Romero
Reviews.Content: It does what it's supposed to do. I just needed the camera to install it at the front door to watch who's at the door from my room's TV. The night capability is good. Sharp image. I recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Good cameras!
Reviews.Author: Daziegrl4
Reviews.Content: Very good cameras for the price. I have ordered several of these for my 16 channel DVR security system and have only had one go bad on me in the last year or so. Great deal for me. I even get the squaretrade warranties to go with them so hopefully they will pay for the bad one I just sent back.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: D. Mullen
Reviews.Content: good camera for a good price works just as expected I needed an outdoor vandal proof and the fits the bill

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Love it or hate it
Reviews.Content: Works as described, but the mounting hardware is a bit cumbersome. I would buy another one if I need another durable dome.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: CARLOS
Reviews.Content: u get what u paid for they arent that bad looks ok  if u have not that much money and u want a security system  buy them  works for me

Reviews.Title: These cams a GREAT
Reviews.Author: John R Kotulik
Reviews.Content: Night vision is great, look good on wall. Cable system is clan. Could be used in many applications. FAST dekivery

Reviews.Title: kio
Reviews.Author: Leszek Cebulak
Reviews.Content: , Love it, works for me, will buy again and recomend, to friends and anemies too, why not , I am neutral.

Reviews.Title: Ok in daytime, not so good at night
Reviews.Author: DT "dt"
Reviews.Content: The camera is okay for the price but does not work very well with the IR illumination.  It seems that the brightness adjustment doesn't work.  Even at this price I wouldn't purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Not bad in daylight
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cartelli
Reviews.Content: Unfortuneately at night when it's most needed it performs poorly. A big bright spot makes it hard to make out what is in the view of camera. It's adequate for the low price but there is a compromise in poor night vision.

Reviews.Title: A GREAT price / performance camera.
Reviews.Author: M. Zingsheim "Netdoc Mike"
Reviews.Content: I have an 8 channel DVR with 4 cameras to monitor the walkways around our house. I needed a camera with a little while wider field of view at the front door which receives the most traffic.The VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Infrared Home Security Camera proved to be an excellent choice for a limited budget..The daytime color and the nighttime low light capabilities are, in my opinion, excellent. The image is quite sharp and I can read a license plate at about 15 feet in daytime.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: angel gonzalez
Reviews.Content: The camera is well made and comes with the power core wish is a big plus and the angle lenses is great

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This is a good product and works well, however, I would rather see you purchase a 700 TVL which is a much clearer picture and for the money it is worth making the change.  If money is a problem this Video Camera works well.

Reviews.Title: Cameras ok
Reviews.Author: godschild
Reviews.Content: We bought four of these and all four react differently as far as the images you see. Strange. They are better than some bullet versions we purchased but still not as high quality as we wanted for night vision.

Reviews.Title: Home security camera
Reviews.Author: RENE GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: Item was as described. This camera was better than the ones that go with my set which were more expensive.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Smartshopper1233
Reviews.Content: Does a great job and fairly clear for only 480 TVL whereas all my other cameras are 600 TVL....thought I'd try it out.  Does a great job!  I got it to replace bad camera as we have complete system in place with wiring in attic and dropped into ceiling cameras around property.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: anthony ramkhalawan
Reviews.Content: This is the best product, it function's very well at night, the built in light allows coloured vision at night, i am definately purchasing another for the eastern side of my property.

Reviews.Title: I can see you!!!
Reviews.Author: Trecia W
Reviews.Content: This small but very efficient camera has a clear vision of who is at my front door without the use of eye glasses.  If I don't want someone to visit, I could just look at the camera and decline to open the door and if a burglar tries to break in... I can see you!

Reviews.Title: Great outdoor security camera
Reviews.Author: D. Tatum "IT_Guy"
Reviews.Content: I have ordered six of these over the past year in the build out of my home security system. Cant beat them for the price, but I do agree with others who say the night mode is a little washed out. All in all, a solid choice for a home DVR system.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I bought one to see if I would like it and how clear it would be . I like it alot and bought more to keep on stock. They are nice and clear and also LED's can see far and clear at night .

Reviews.Title: wow I can see
Reviews.Author: tacmtz
Reviews.Content: These wide range cameras are great. the picture is clear, works better in less sheltered areas than others do. Easy to mount and operate. Work well with the other brands of DVR's. It even shows the cobweb from the spider outside as she is doing the web. Fog shows up nicely on this camera.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Infrared Home Security Camera Color CCD
Reviews.Author: walter loggins
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera five stars because it exceeded my expectations.  I have tried other cameras in this price range and this camera is by far the best I have had.  The colors are right, the focus is very good and this make for great video.  The night vision and viewing distant is great.  The wide viewing angle is just right for the angle I wanted covered.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: MR F
Reviews.Content: Came on time, works great.  Well made metal housing and easy to point.  Quality is fine for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Ward
Reviews.Content: We love that it is tamper proof!  Gives a good quality picture, just make sure you order an extra cable to run it to your hardrive. It only comes with a power cable.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Drawdry
Reviews.Content: I don't get  high quality picture, but I wasn't expecting to see every little thing at night. I just need to see if someone comes on my property.Do not forget to buy the power cord you need to hook this up.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: St8away
Reviews.Content: Used this to extend the area coverage and supplement some other cameras (see my other reviews) that I bought. Worked as I expected them to.

Reviews.Title: a very good camera
Reviews.Author: roush family
Reviews.Content: work`s better camera that i ever seen for the price so i bought two of them and at the price`s i seen any camera and why paid  alot of money for high tech camera`s why these`s camera`s really well at both day and night looking to buy some later down the road

Reviews.Title: Had to return due to DVR system returned.
Reviews.Author: John G. Van Welij
Reviews.Content: Sorry but can't say anything about the cam since the DVR system was returned (see Q-See DVR review) and this cam needs a DVR.

Reviews.Title: Worth every cent
Reviews.Author: keisha pennie
Reviews.Content: This product arrived within a week to Trinidad.Day and night vision is perfect would recommended this product to anyone best value for money

Reviews.Title: LOUIE
Reviews.Author: stirup
Reviews.Content: GOOD PICTURE, CLEAR,  IT DOESN,T COME WITH  POWER WIRE, I WISH IT DID . OTHER THAN THAT IT,S GOOD PRODUCT

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: JOE
Reviews.Content: WORKS WELL GREAT CANERA FOR PRICE EASY INSTALLATIONS WORKS DAY OR NIGHT ADDITION ADDTO M SECURITY SET UP HAD IT FOR 3 MONTHS

Reviews.Title: Works ok in the day.
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: It works very good in the day but a little blurr in the night. Wide angle view is a plus but you cannot rcognize someone.Overall I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good night vision
Reviews.Author: Mallyn
Reviews.Content: Purchased other cameras in the past, this is a good value. The mounting set up is great for door ways

Reviews.Title: Good product and low price.
Reviews.Author: AP
Reviews.Content: Good resolutiuon and color . Works well in complete darkness (black and white).No perfect but for this low price is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly, durable, easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Xmamaster
Reviews.Content: I used the camera to see the stage for a performance that I ran the lights for and it was great!  The night vision worked very well, I could see more than 50 feet away from the camera in complete darkness.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Sully
Reviews.Content: For the price I thought this product was going to be mediocre at best but I have been very happy with it so far.  The night vision leaves a little to be expected but  that is to be expected.  This is by far hands down better than the cheap cameras that came with my system and I plan on purchasing more of these if the need arises.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, reliable to.
Reviews.Author: Todd Kelley
Reviews.Content: Be careful not to point them up so high the LEDs bounce off the locking and cause halos, I had to shim mine easy fix!

Reviews.Title: Great night vision and daytime video!
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace an old camera that died.  This one is more compact, and has better day time video and night vision than all of the other older cameras on the system, even though I paid over $100 each for them!Super fast shipping from this vendor too!No down side here.

Reviews.Title: Small and well made
Reviews.Author: Brad Blickenstaff
Reviews.Content: I am building a new house and I purchased this for the front door. It is small and hopefully won't draw too much attention to it's self. The picture quaility is ok for the money...you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: This camera is pretty amazing for the price
Reviews.Author: Lancelot
Reviews.Content: I've installed a couple of these.  They work very well in the dark and also show very good colors in the daytime.  If you are not getting a nice picture from this camera, check your other equipment.  Your recorder might be a little sub par, but it is not the camera.I have one of them on a 100' extension chord and it looks as good as one that is plugged directly into the unit.Bright white, easy install, and it's very professional looking.  Smile, you're on camera.....pretty much everywhere you go.

Reviews.Title: Monitor indoor
Reviews.Author: Grace W
Reviews.Content: Nice screen and cute looking camera. View 50 feet well, with average quality pictures. This will pictures any visitor indoor when not invited.

Reviews.Title: recomended
Reviews.Author: Rem Hernandez Ferro
Reviews.Content: buy this camare to replace and old one, look brigther than the old one, fits the same space, only plug and play

Reviews.Title: Great alternative
Reviews.Author: Melly G
Reviews.Content: I had a old cctv camera with a night vision that wasn't working that well. I got this for a great price and was able to replace it and I can honestly say for the price, it doesn a really good job.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product for great price
Reviews.Author: H. Wilczek "good bargins"
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever had - I had to exchange 2 out of 8 cameras due to problems with night vision. Got my replacement very fast with out any problems.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Shoprat
Reviews.Content: I installed this camera over xmas hoildays night time works welll lettle bugs fly around it but the bats put on quite a show not had to install at all our company uses somthing simular we are going to hide one outside the mangaments window just to say tucshee . love the product and peace of mind

Reviews.Title: Bad night. Vision
Reviews.Author: Kris Yawnick
Reviews.Content: Great during the day. But terrible night vision. I get lines going through my screen on my smart phone. Will never buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Worked for my needs
Reviews.Author: Kimba3
Reviews.Content: Put this at back of house to watch over a backdoor, a sliding  glass door and garage door. That's about a 30 ft length. The camera has good color and extends well over a 50 ft distance. Night vision is less, about 35 ft.  Side to side viewing is about 15 ft.  It works for my instance of covering my back deck and 3 doors.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera...
Reviews.Author: James Southard "JoeCop"
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a good quality flush mount camera, this is it...  It looks good, is relatively easy to mount and has good video quality.

Reviews.Title: Good quality and good picture.
Reviews.Author: tman
Reviews.Content: This camera was solidly built with an aluminum housing. The color is pretty accurate and the night vision is awesome and the angle is very wide.  The reason for the four star is because you will have a difficult time recognizing faces at distance of more than 10 feet.

Reviews.Title: I see you!
Reviews.Author: DodgeD
Reviews.Content: This works as advertised and I am pleased. Along with the cables I reviewed this makes a good outdoor security system. I see the cats roaming around and sitting on my car. Sometimes the racoon comes to visit them.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: This item seems to work great for the money.  Easy install.  Just plug and play with your box .  Looks just as pictured.  Works pretty good with out problems .

Reviews.Title: 1 of 2 cameras didn't work
Reviews.Author: A. Martin
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these cameras. One of them didn't work, however the other one is ok. The one that worked is very good. The quality is sharp and clear. The wide angle of the camera is nice. Installation was pretty easy. The housing of the camera is of solid construction (metal).What really impressed me was the night viewing of this camera. The built-in IR LEDs worked great to illuminate the entire viewing field out to about 30 feet.If it were not for the one defective camera I would be rating this a 5 stars. But, I am ordering a replacement (same model) for the defective one. So that is a testament to the value of the product.5 out of 5 for value1 out of 5 for quality control

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera
Reviews.Author: B. Hall
Reviews.Content: The thing this camera has going for it is the ease of adjusting once mounted. I am a professional certified camera / alarm technician and I was impressed with this camera for the money. I will use this to replace the use of mini dome cams because installation and and adjustment is quick and easy. With mini domes sometimes you must remove one side mounting screw on the board cam when mounting on a wall to get the correct angle, but that's not the case with this "ball" type camera. Basic ccd and about 3.6mm lens.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: G8r0499
Reviews.Content: Great picture night and day. Easy to install. Great camera for the price. Camera seems to point down too low. Couldn't adjust the camera to shoot horizontally enough so the area of surveilance was kind of limited.

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just wondering if you can connect this to a computer I like it vary much would love to connect to computer it is more easyer for me.

Reviews.Title: Works well as a baby video monitor
Reviews.Author: J. Beams "JB"
Reviews.Content: I have this mounted over my son's bed, and it works great both day and night.  The housing is also metal (aluminum or zinc - can't tell since it's painted), unlike a previous black model I purchased which had an all-plastic enclosure.I have a 12V distribution panel so I didn't bother with the "free" adaptor.  In fact I wish there was a cheaper option that didn't even include it - even if it was only a couple dollars cheaper.After about 3 months of use I've noticed that some of the IR LEDs are already starting to go bad (thus 4 star rating).  I'm not too concerned since I can replace them myself, but for someone less tech-savy that might be an issue over the long term.

Reviews.Title: Unimpressive night performance, but not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Matt W
Reviews.Content: Installation was pretty easy.  I spent about an hour mounting the camera and was able to mount it in a very clean and unobtrusive manner under the eave of my garage.  The installation left no cables showing whatsoever.  Note that you will need a wall or box or something on the other side of where you mount this camera to make the connections.  There is not enough room between the camera and the mounting base to "tuck" the BNC/power connectors, extra length of cable, etc.  The cable off the camera is maybe 12-18 inches long so I simply bundled everything up inside the garage.As far as image quality, I would say that daytime performance is "as expected" and nighttime performance is "below expectations".  My night time image is much hazier than the other posted example so perhaps there is a defect with mine.  I will upload photos so that you can see for yourself.  It looks like the IR lights are reflecting into the lens in some way, as I can see the haziness go away when the IR lights go off in the morning.I will say it's pretty decent for the money (paid $39.99 and free shipping with Prime) - however, I am adding an additional camera and will be shopping for a better one.

Reviews.Title: Good cameras
Reviews.Author: snackdaddy
Reviews.Content: I bought these cameras to put around a friends house. They are an excellent value for the price. I would recommend them to anyone who has a low hanging roof. All the cables are hidden in the camera housing.

Reviews.Title: Wide Angle
Reviews.Author: Sonja
Reviews.Content: Nice compact camera. Tamper Resistant. I really like the wide angle and clarity. I liked is so much I purchased 2 more to replace some of my more expensive Security Camera;s.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described.
Reviews.Author: rbtvance
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described. This item was was well packaged, shipped and received promptly, and was exactly as described. This is a good product and was good customer service.

Reviews.Title: Good, solid, quality camera.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent video quality.  Heavy duty metal housing, not the usual cheap plastic.  Installation was a breeze. I would definitely purchase this unit again.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Casto "Bex"
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely a great deal!! Its practically plug and play. Other reviews and Amazon suggest that you buy the extra Video RCA Cable and thats exactly what I did.  VideoSecu 100 Feet Video Power BNC RCA Cable for CCTV Security Cameras 1JE My hubby had it hooked up the same day that it was delivered. The "night vision" is awesome! Overall, we love it and plan to buy more cameras in the future!

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Dgarl
Reviews.Content: Hello all I originally bought this for my front porch, let me say I love the look. I liked it so much I bought another one to replace the one in front of my bedroom. Nice color tones and a wider angle than most camera.

Reviews.Title: More than expected!!!!
Reviews.Author: WookeeNStooph
Reviews.Content: Was pleased from the time I opened the box. Yes the instructions are vague, but if you have any common knowledge of how to use a cordless drill and how to connect wires from one end of your house to the next, and into a tv, than you are golden. The range is excellent on this camera. I could not be more pleased that I spent very little money and got a great product. This camera picks up pretty decent images of the house next to us and across the street two houses down. With the white color matching the siding on our house, it hides well. The IR picks up nicely except bright lights, but I did not put it close to any light source. Easy install, Great picture, overall, I would say it is well worth the purchase. VideoSecu Day Night Vision CCTV Home Security Camera CCD Outdoor Vandal Proof 420TVL 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens with Free Power Supply 1WX

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: SLBoston
Reviews.Content: I lucked out and snagged this camera when it was on sale.  Even not on sale, it's still a great price for the quality.  We installed it on our porch to try to capture some unruly neighborhood boys who have been vandalizing houses on our street.  The picture quality is very impressive during both day and night.  I was also surprised at the range of this camera.  We installed it on the end of our porch and it captures our entire porch, door, and about half of our driveway.  Installation was easy and the additional purchase of an inexpensive dvr card (also on Amazon) turned our computer into a recording device.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: mickeywrench
Reviews.Content: I Purchased this camera to monitor front porch area.  This camera produces a crisp color picture. At night picture is ok.  Easy to set up, easy to install.Camera is fully adjustable for wall or ceiling mounting. I will be adding more of this cameras do to the fact they provide a great clear picture & is affordable.  Do I recomend this camera for home or small business use: YES. Do I recomend warehouseseller: YES. (Quick shipping too).Purchase this camera before you spend alot. Great Value at an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Blaise
Reviews.Content: Camera was DOA. Attempted to return the camera and they wanted me to allow them remote access to my computer to trouble shoot a ANALOG camera. Total waste of time.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Katie "Katie"
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible.  The picture was green and flickered constantly.  The seller was difficult to deal with, and I lost big time on the return shipping.  Huge, huge, huge waste of my time and money.

Reviews.Title: home security video camera
Reviews.Author: willard carter
Reviews.Content: I really was pleased with the camera, installed it and it worked well and all of a sudden it stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Broken within a month
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Murray "Lucy"
Reviews.Content: I don't know how or why but it stopped working. Wish someone would help me I bought all new wires from the same seller no progress

Reviews.Title: Cameras
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just love these, we will be getting a few more to replace the old ones that we have now.

Reviews.Title: dont waste money
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: i got this camera today hooked it up everything was fine. move it to were i wanted it and nothing. the lights are on but no picture.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as reviews claim
Reviews.Author: bobcat
Reviews.Content: Camera is cheep and you cant make out a face at 25ft during the daytime. Nightime cant see noting without a portchlight on.BUT it is cheep

Reviews.Title: It suckes
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This is not s good camera. it has a bad camera. also i put it ouside in wich it says it can withstand but it broke that night. But it did catch my brother steallign 20 bucks so thats a plus.

Reviews.Title: I haven't installed them yet
Reviews.Author: xochi718
Reviews.Content: As soon as I have these little suckers installed, I'll let you know how I like them.  The installer says they're great for the price.  I am looking for long cables and a dvr that will interface with my macbook and my iphone.  that's the expense of this endeavor!

Reviews.Title: I have other cameras that work much better.
Reviews.Author: Raven
Reviews.Content: First, I'm not getting a colored picture and second, I cannot move the lens around to get the angle I want. It's very hard for me to get the angle I want when the housing inside the mount doesn't move, at all. Someone else said you can but I can't. Maybe mine is stuck or I'm just not doing it right but it's not moving for anything and I don't want to force it with a tool in fear I'll end up breaking it.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I had the wiring missing ... Not so happy with my item but oh well I need to keep now and try to work out something ...

Reviews.Title: Item should NOT be in "Wireless" section.....!
Reviews.Author: jimlp1
Reviews.Content: Item as described is a CCTV camera, CCTV means Closed Circuit Televised Video its a system that uses BNC connectors and Cable run to each Camera, therefore it is NOT WIRELESS..........!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MY MONEY.
Reviews.Author: Blessed
Reviews.Content: I sent for 4 of these when they were 44.00 a piece! I should have sent them back right away! I had a million things on my plate and all of a sudden I am realizing "hey, these don't work at all at night!" They only work very close up. And I MEAN CLOSE up...  WHO cares about during day! A total waste of money. They need to remove these off the market! F-.  They should pay me for the money  I had to take paying someone to put them up! I feel totally deceived!

Reviews.Title: Spy on your guests.......
Reviews.Author: M. JAMES
Reviews.Content: Excellent little spy camera just fitted nicely in guest bedroom disguised as a smoke alarm.Shame there is no sound!Appears to be waterproof.

Reviews.Title: Lowest quality
Reviews.Author: Thant Aye
Reviews.Content: So much noise, unable to see a view, looks like they send a return item. Or this brand itself very poor quality.installed 2 months after I bought then I did not try to return.Its a scam co. both camera and cable are faulty.
